NOTE.1: UNR_1.x, URN_2.x depend on the transmission protocol, e.g. ZigBee, WLAN, LoRo etc.
NOTE.2: URN_1.x is needed to identify the device
NOTE.3: URN_2.x is needed to identify the attribute/command
NOTE.4: URN_2.x can be an empty strings '', if the device has only one attribute or command
NOTE.5: entity_name is not mandatory, but can be used to make the mapping intuitive
